column4: //* forces case sensitive,  ~ separates variations of words ex: "video ~video,~video." will not match VideoRay

column3: The state or action where the volume in the Water Sampler is getting smaller, forcing a sample to be expelled
The process of filling the Water Sampler with a sample
The reduction of volume in the Water Sampler causing a sample to be expelled
The increase of volume in the Water Sampler causing a sample to be collected
The process of emptying the Water Sampler of a collected sample
The state or action where the volume in the Water Sampler is getting larger, forcing a sample to be collected
the space inside of the syringe
